message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent chunk of the money to get us started.
Let's be fair, Alice.  A 50/50 split is the most equitable solution.  We both get a significant amount and there's no need for further negotiation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up more than 40% of the total. This is my best offer so far.
Alice, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to give you 40%, but I need at least 60% to make this worthwhile for me.  Let's avoid further rounds and come to an agreement.
